verbose_text: XREF_BIBR In addition, resveratrol can induce the activation of the Nrf2 pathway and the inhibition of nuclear factor kappaB (NF-kappaB) activity, XREF_BIBR exerting a protective effect against neuroinflammation and counteracting the progression of brain aging.
evidence: resveratrol can induce the activation of the Nrf2 pathway and the inhibition of nuclear factor kappaB
